front.title: Prioritized Treatment of Specific OSPF Version 2 Packets and Congestion Avoidance

abstract.t: This document recommends methods that are intended to improve the scalability and stability of large networks using OSPF (Open Shortest Path First) Version 2 protocol. The methods include processing OSPF Hellos and LSA (Link State Advertisement) Acknowledgments at a higher priority compared to other OSPF packets, and other congestion avoidance procedures.
